body_html:
Did not seem to work for me, perhaps I am doing something wrong?
set LIB=C:\Users\ALuo\Anaconda3\pkgs\mkl-2018.0.0-h36b65af_4\Library\lib;%LIB%
Contents are as follows:

mkl_blacs_ilp64_dll.lib   mkl_pgi_thread_dll.lib
mkl_blacs_lp64_dll.lib    mkl_rt.lib
mkl_cdft_core_dll.lib     mkl_scalapack_ilp64_dll.lib
mkl_core_dll.lib          mkl_scalapack_lp64_dll.lib
mkl_intel_ilp64_dll.lib   mkl_sequential_dll.lib
mkl_intel_lp64_dll.lib    mkl_tbb_thread_dll.lib
mkl_intel_thread_dll.lib

echoing %LIB% also shows that the path is included

body:
Did not seem to work for me, perhaps I am doing something wrong?
`set LIB=C:\Users\ALuo\Anaconda3\pkgs\mkl-2018.0.0-h36b65af_4\Library\lib;%LIB%`
Contents are as follows:
```
mkl_blacs_ilp64_dll.lib   mkl_pgi_thread_dll.lib
mkl_blacs_lp64_dll.lib    mkl_rt.lib
mkl_cdft_core_dll.lib     mkl_scalapack_ilp64_dll.lib
mkl_core_dll.lib          mkl_scalapack_lp64_dll.lib
mkl_intel_ilp64_dll.lib   mkl_sequential_dll.lib
mkl_intel_lp64_dll.lib    mkl_tbb_thread_dll.lib
mkl_intel_thread_dll.lib
```

echoing %LIB% also shows that the path is included
